ItemWeapon.name: tesla rifle
ItemWeapon.description: Starting from the stock the weapon starts with a bank of daisy chained batteries that in turn feed into a crystalline core located just ahead of the trigger, after which a complex series of electrical channels, baffles and focusing apparati form a long barrel pleasingly vernian in its complexity that terminates in a pair of jutting prongs. does 6-10 lightning damage. (A)

hitText.text: you shock TARGET with a blast of lightning for VALUE damage
